front.title: Evaluation Test Cases for Interactive Real-Time Media over Wireless Networks

abstract.t: There is an ongoing effort in IETF RMCAT working group to standardize rate adaptation algorithm(s) for real-time interactive communication. To ensure seamless and robust user experience, the proposed rate adaptation algorithm(s) should work well across all access network types. This document describes test cases for evaluating performances of the proposed rate adaptation solutions over LTE and Wi-Fi networks.
